function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'rand' to reach function 'main'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'rand'?
loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < 10' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 10' always executed?

dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 10' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'a (line 5)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'i (line 6)' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'i' live at the end of function 'main'?
Does variable 'j' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the program actually reach the statement: “int t;”?
